data.title: Badged Cross (Let Us Plant It For You, Select Your Badge)
data.meta_description: All profits from the Let Us Plant It For You - Edinburgh Garden of Remembrance will go towards Lady Haig's Poppy Factory Scotland work in supporting the Armed Forces community.
data.text:
LET US PLANT IT FOR YOU â€“ PLANTED BADGED REMEMBRANCE SYMBOL SERVICE - This service allows us to plant a cross on your behalf informally after the opening ceremony.

Service also available for Wreaths, see:

Let Us Lay It For You (Select Badge From Dropdown)

Let Us Lay It For You (Upload Your Own Badge)

We would like to offer you the opportunity to have a Badged Remembrance Symbol, with an image of your choice, planted in the Edinburgh Garden of Remembrance in Princes Street Gardens.

The Garden will open this year on Monday 21st October 2024 and will be open until Tuesday 12th November 2024 when it will be dismantled.

Additionally, we will send you an e-mail image of your cross, planted in the Garden, for you to keep. A photo will be sent to the registered e-mail address supplied as soon after Remembrance Sunday as possible along with a photo of the Garden.

Instructions on selecting a badge

We hold a huge library of assorted badges, please indicate from the Customise Your Item, Select an Existing Badge section which badge you require.

Queries should be sent by e-mail to support@lhpfscotland.org.uk

Please send your order number and your billing postcode.
